A couple of con men are accused of heisting a gold shipment intended for some refugees in one of China's famine areas. The con men accuse each other for the heist after a bounty is put out for the arrest of the parties who did the heist.
 After the double crossing, squabbling, and fighting that the two partake in daily does not bring any money to their pockets, the twosome decide to combine their energy to find the real guy behind the gold heist.
 Plenty of good Kung Fu in this flick, especially towards the end.
